content: *materials * - small-6 baby yarn 1 + 1/4 mc 1/2 oz skin colour crochet hook sizes c/2 & d/3 34 x 1/8 wide ribbon - medium-8 3 ply sport weight yarn 1 + 1/2 oz mc small amount cc 3/4 oz skin colour crochet hook sizes e/4 & f/5 34 x 1/4 wide ribbon - large-11 4 ply yarn 4 oz mc small amount cc 1 oz skin colour crochet hook sizes f/5 & g/6 42 x 1/4 wide ribbon free-crochet 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_for_babies_and_children/bunting_doll/
